channel.title: CVE Feed for HackerOne -- jshamcrest node module

item.title: CVE-2016-10521|2024-08-06T03:21:52.155Z -- hackerone -- jshamcrest%20node%20module
item.description: jshamcrest is vulnerable to regular expression denial of service (ReDoS) when certain types of user input is passed in to the emailAddress validator.
